name: last-lite
description: Last Chaos-flavored browser MMO with hub-and-instance structure

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.lint: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install && cd ../e2e && npm install
scripts.milestone:m0: npm run guard:no3d && npm run test:server -- -t M0 && npm run test:client -- -t M0 && npm run e2e -- --grep M0
